title: Joel McHale
description:
Actor and comedian Joel McHale feels a little anxious, but good about being Conan O’Brien’s friend.

 

Joel sits down with Conan to talk about his affinity for the blade, reflecting back on Community, danger stories of climbing Mt. Rainier, and joining the superhero world in the DC series Stargirl. Later, Conan and his team debate the science behind The Human Centipede.

 

Got a question for Conan? Call our voicemail: (323) 451-2821.

For Conan videos, tour dates and more visit TeamCoco.com.
author: conaf@teamcoco.com (Team Coco & Earwolf)
